footer.description: Your trusted partner for shipping from China to Libya

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Golden Horse Company
about.description: A Libyan company specialized in providing international trade services, established in the People's Republic of China as one of Al-Morjan Group's arms.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be Libya's leading commercial partner in China, offering reliable and comprehensive trade and import services that connect the Chinese market with MENA efficiently, with quality and transparency.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To deliver a smooth and safe import experience through integrated solutions starting from sourcing the right supplier to delivering the product to its final destination, while maintaining quality and transparency at every step.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.transparency: Transparency: We believe that trust begins with clarity
values.responsibility: Responsibility: We commit to our customers from contracting to delivery
values.professionalism: Professionalism: Trained teams and precise procedures at every stage
values.flexibility: Flexibility: Tailored solutions that adapt to changing market needs
values.guarantee: Guarantee of rights: Legal contracts and real quality guarantees
